title: How do I move the 'play the news' routine??
content:
I've set a routine to happen when I turn my alarm off. Great... No! Why can I not move the 'play the news' routine that seems to be stuck at the bottom?

2 parts of my routine are play *radio station* on kitchen speaker and play the news. I want the news to play and complete first on my phone, then when that has finished, start playing the radio on the kitchen speaker. This currently doesn't happen as when I go into the kitchen part way through the news, the radio is already playing so I have to turn it off to hear continue to hear the news. 

I can not move the 'play the news' routine's and can not add another one after it. It is fixed as the last routine.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3a
